00007 std::string ORCaenV260Decoder::GetParName(size_t iPar)
00008 {
00009   switch(iPar) {
00010     case 0: return "crate";
00011     case 1: return "card";
00012     case 2: return "utime";
00013     case 3: return "channel";
00014     case 4: return "scaler";
00015     default:
00016       ORLog(kWarning) << "GetParName(): index (" << iPar
00017                       << ") out of range." << std::endl;
00018       return "unknown";
00019   }
00020 }
00021 
00022 UInt_t ORCaenV260Decoder::GetPar(UInt_t* record, size_t iPar, size_t iRow)
00023 {
00024   switch(iPar) {
00025     case 0: return CrateOf(record);
00026     case 1: return CardOf(record);
00027     case 2: return UTimeOf(record);
00028     case 3: return IthChannelOf(iRow);
00029     case 4: return IthScalerOf(record, iRow);
00030     default:
00031       ORLog(kWarning) << "GetPar(): index (" << iPar
00032                       << ") out of range." << std::endl;
00033       return 0;
00034   }
00035 }
